paper_metadata.title: The Impact of Workplace Inspections on Understanding and Compliance with Occupational Safety and Health Legislation in Sri Lanka

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The outcome variables are understanding of and compliance with the FO
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This study utilizes the propensity score matching technique to estimate data that closely match factories from both the treatment and control groups based on similar characteristics

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: In Sri Lanka, occupational safety and health legislation is implemented by the factories ordinance (FO), which is enforced by factory inspecting engineers through factory inspection
evidence_citations.country_citation: In Sri Lanka, occupational safety and health legislation is implemented by the factories ordinance (FO)
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Among the 102 factories in the study, 50 factories had been inspected (treatment) previously, and the remaining 52 had not been inspected (control) during the last five years
